DBSheetConfig.query: SELECT T1.emp_id, T1.fname, T1.minit, T1.lname, T6.job_desc AS job_id, T1.job_lvl, T8.pub_name AS pub_id FROM pubs.dbo.employee T1 INNER JOIN pubs.dbo.jobs T6 ON T1.job_id = T6.job_id INNER JOIN pubs.dbo.publishers T8 ON T1.pub_id = T8.pub_id

field.name: *job_id
field.lookup: SELECT job_desc,job_id FROM pubs.dbo.jobs ORDER BY job_desc DESC

field.name: *pub_id
field.lookup: SELECT pub_name,pub_id FROM pubs.dbo.publishers ORDER BY pub_name DESC
